author: berlingske.dk
title: Ground News - Two were taken to hospital after accident involving illegal fireworks
text:
Summary by berlingske.dk Two men had to go to hospital after they ignited a larger quantity of illegal fireworks. They are not in mortal danger. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Politiken Two were taken to hospital after accident involving illegal fireworks Two men were admitted to the hospital, after they suspected an illegal firework. They are not in mortal danger.
